nuhker

Class Accountant

  • java.lang.Object
    • nuhker.Accountant

  • public class Accountant
extends java.lang.Object
    The class supports main routines datawise, makes decisions on whether or not to deal with next target, depending on the recorded "database". The class serves DataDiver class, uses interface defined in DbFace and logs according to LogHandler.
    Author:
    coder037@xyz.ee

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String countryCode,
        java.lang.String fileWritingBasename)
        The method initializes log files via TypeWriter. Called only once from Accountant class.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - - a 2-letter countrycode according to EnumOf.cc
        fileWritingBasename - - a Basename used for most files.

      • initialASRegistration

        public static void initialASRegistration(java.lang.String asn,
                         java.lang.String baseFileName)
        This method writes down the initial set of ASN values got from RIPE. This is done for 2 reasons, to have a clear input trail and, to obtain AS descriptions later.
        Parameters:
        asn - - one AS name in format AS12345
        baseFileName - - a timevalue used in filename

      • saysWorthToDive

        public static boolean saysWorthToDive(java.lang.String countrycode,
                      java.lang.String prey,
                      java.lang.String baseFileName)
        The decision method - makes decision about the target being ASN, URL or numeric ASN. Some extra decisions are made - to catch ASNs related to the country being harvested and
        Parameters:
        countrycode - - a parameter defining "own" country so that own resources can be separated into different result files
        prey - - next target to be analyzed - an AS or an URL
        baseFileName - - a timevalue string used as a part for logfile names
        Returns:
        wasFreshMeat - a boolean value indicating whether the target was new or was already seen earlier

      • publicizeStatistics

        public static void publicizeStatistics()
        The method will publicize some status data otherwise kept in the DBze.

      • finalStatements

        public static void finalStatements()
        A formal method to present some run statistics.
